title: Video: WU LYF – Brooklyn Girls / Summas Bliss
body: Fresh from their recent tour of the US, Manchester quartet **WU LYF** have released this gorgeous little video shot during their time in New York, filmed by ABF, the same people who produced the video for _[Concrete Gold](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8XhoQJcoKxA&feature=plcp)_. Featuring **Francis Lung’s** _Brooklyn Girls_ and **WU LYF’s** _Summas Bliss_, it’s a fitting tribute to one of the finest acts around at the moment. Check it out below.
